# Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
# if 'prod' in Environment:
#     StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
# else:
#     StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
#     StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
#     StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorage'
#     StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# # ' + StorageAccount + '

# #Create DataFrame for the publicfinancedata TMS Table
# publicfinancedata = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/TMS/publicfinancedata.parquet', format='parquet')
# publicfinancedata.createOrReplaceTempView("publicfinancedata")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stfinancedata
AS
SELECT
    f.id as tms_financedata_id
    ,f.bookingid as tms_financedata_bookingid
    ,to_timestamp(7200+f.insdate) as tms_financedata_insdate
    ,f.peaksurchagrebuy as tms_financedata_peaksurchagrebuy
    ,f.peaksurchagresell as tms_financedata_peaksurchagresell
    ,f.manualentryroadhaulsell as tms_financedata_manualentryroadhaulsell
    ,f.manualentryahocsell as tms_financedata_manualentryahocsell
    ,f.systemfuellevy as tms_financedata_systemfuellevy
    ,f.systemratefuellevy as tms_financedata_systemratefuellevy
    ,f.systemratefuelexlevy as tms_financedata_systemratefuelexlevy
    ,f.systemratefuelinclevy as tms_financedata_systemratefuelinclevy
    ,f.systemsellrate as tms_financedata_systemsellrate
    ,f.totalsellrate as tms_financedata_totalsellrate
    ,to_timestamp(7200+f.moddate) as tms_financedata_moddate
    ,f.totalbuyrate as tms_financedata_totalbuyrate
    ,f.rateprofileid as tms_financedata_rateprofileid



FROM publicfinancedata f
